AT.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
AT.description: Kirby, König Nickerchen, Meta Knight und Waddle Dee verwandeln das Wohnzimmer wieder ins quietschbunte Traumland, wenn im Dezember Kirby’s Adventure Wii erscheint. Bis zu vier Spieler gleichzeitig können sich auf Nintendos TV-Konsole in das neue 2D-Abenteuer stürzen. In immer wechselnder Gestalt führt Kirby das berühmt-berüchtigte Quartett an. Die Spieler können dem kugeligen Helden erneut dabei helfen, seine Gegner zu besiegen, indem er sie aufsaugt, sie wieder ausspeit oder sie herunterschluckt und dadurch ihre Fähigkeiten und Formen annimmt. Das actionreiche Jump’n’Run beginnt mit der Notlandung eines außerirdischen Raumschiffs. Dessen Einzelteile werden weit über das friedliche Popstar Land verstreut. Um dem verzweifelten Alien die Rückkehr zu seinem Heimatplaneten zu ermöglichen, tut sich Kirby ausnahmsweise mit seinen alten Gegnern zusammen: Gemeinsam mit König Nickerchen, Meta Knight und Waddle Dee macht er sich daran, die Trümmer des Raumschiffs wiederzufinden und zusammenzufügen. Die Spieler können sich dieser Herausforderung allein stellen oder bis zu drei weitere Freunde als Helfer engagieren. Zudem haben sie die Wahl zwischen verschiedenen Charakteren: Alle Mitspieler dürfen Kirby sein - jeder in einer anderen Farbe - oder sie schlüpfen in die Rolle eines der drei einstigen Kirby-Gegner. Es ist nicht zwingend nötig, dass alle einen Level gemeinsam beginnen oder beenden: Mitstreitern ist es jederzeit möglich, im laufenden Spiel ein- oder auszusteigen.

AU.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
AU.description: Kirby, Meta Knight, King Dedede and Waddle Dee are ready to transform your living room into Dream Land once more in Kirby's Adventure Wii! In this side-scrolling adventure game, you can play on your own or with up to three of your friends. Kirby, in his many guises, is in control of the infamous foursome – help him use his powerful Copy Ability to inhale, spit or transform as enemies rise to the challenge. Kicking off this action packed adventure, an alien spaceship has crash-landed, scattering pieces of the ship across the otherwise peaceful Popstar land. The alien is desperate to return to its home planet and so Kirby and his enemies decide to work together and help - starting out on a mission to find the missing chunks of the vessel which have been spread across the realm. Play on your own or recruit up to three friends who can join in the fun. Whether you want to all play as Kirby, each in a different colour, or mix things up by each taking a different character – Meta Knight, King Dedede and Waddle Dee – you can all enjoy playing cooperatively to progress through the game by collecting Point Stars and Ability Stars. Don’t worry if you only meet up with your friends for a short while, anyone can join and leave the game at any time.

BG.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
BG.description: Kirby, Meta Knight, King Dedede and Waddle Dee are ready to transform your living room into Dream Land once more in Kirby's Adventure Wii! Kicking off this action packed adventure, an alien spaceship has crash-landed, scattering pieces of the ship across the otherwise peaceful Popstar land. Whether you want to all play as Kirby, each in a different colour, or mix things up by each taking a different character – Meta Knight, King Dedede and Waddle Dee – you can all enjoy playing cooperatively to progress through the game by collecting Point Stars and Ability Stars. Don’t worry if you only meet up with your friends for a short while, anyone can join and leave the game at any time.

BE.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
BE.description: Kirby, Meta Knight, le Roi DaDiDou et Waddle Dee viennent une fois de plus transformer votre salon en Dream Land avec Kirby's Adventure Wii ! Au début de cette épopée explosive, un vaisseau spatial s’écrase et les parties de l’appareil se dispersent à travers le paisible pays de Dream Land. Un malheureux extraterrestre se retrouve ainsi coincé au pays de Kirby. Il désire désespérément retourner chez lui. Kirby et ses alliés décident de lui venir en aide. Votre mission débute alors : saurez-vous retrouver les parties manquantes du vaisseau dissimulées aux quatre coins du royaume ? Le bonheur d’un extraterrestre en dépend ! Choisissez d’incarner chacun un Kirby différent, ou bien variez les plaisirs en sélectionnant d’autres personnages : Meta Knight, le Roi DaDiDou et Waddle Dee sont ainsi prêts à rejoindre l’aventure. Un nouveau joueur peut s’inviter à tout moment dans la partie pour tirer ses proches d’un mauvais pas ! Chaque joueur peut aussi participer à la chasse aux « étoiles de pouvoir » disséminées sur le champ de bataille, afin de faire grimper le score global.

ES.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
ES.description: Kirby, Meta Knight, el rey Dedede y Waddle Dee están listos para transformar de nuevo tu salón en Dream Land, con Kirby's Adventure Wii, la nueva aventura de Kirby para Wii. En este juego de aventuras de desplazamiento lateral, en el que podrás jugar solo o hasta con tres amigos, el héroe rosado utilizará su poderosa habilidad de copia para inhalar, escupir y transformarse a medida que se enfrenta a los enemigos. Al inicio de esta aventura repleta de acción, una nave espacial alienígena se estrella, esparciendo pedazos de la nave por el otrora tranquilo Popstar. El ocupante de la nave está desesperado por regresar a su planeta, así que Kirby y sus enemigos deciden cooperar y ayudarle, dando así comienzo a una misión destinada a recuperar los pedazos de la nave, que han quedado esparcidos por todo el reino. Juega solo o invita hasta a tres amigos a unirse a la diversión. Independientemente de si todos queréis jugar como Kirby, cada uno con un color, o de si preferís controlar a distintos personajes (Meta Knight, el rey Dedede y Waddle Dee), todos podréis jugar de forma cooperativa para avanzar en la partida recolectando puntos y estrellas. Y no te preocupes si las visitas de tus amigos no son todo lo constantes o largas que quisieras, porque los jugadores pueden unirse al juego y dejarlo en cualquier punto.

IT.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
IT.description: Kirby, Meta Knight, King Dedede e Waddle Dee sono pronti a trasformare ancora una volta il tuo salotto in Dream Land, per il lancio europeo di Kirby's Adventure Wii in dicembre 2011. In questa avventura a scorrimento laterale puoi giocare da solo o coinvolgere fino ad altri tre amici. Nelle sue tante sembianze, Kirby è a capo di questo famigerato quartetto. Aiutalo ad usare le sue potenti Abilità Copia per inalare, sputare e trasformarsi mentre i suoi nemici raccolgono la sfida. Quest'avventura ricca d'azione ha inizio quando una nave spaziale aliena si schianta sul pacifico pianeta Pop Star, andando in mille pezzi. L'alieno vuole assolutamente fare rientro al proprio pianeta, così Kirby e i suoi nemici decidono di collaborare per aiutarlo, dando inizio alla missione di recupero dei pezzi mancanti della nave spaziale, dispersi su tutto il pianeta. Gioca da solo o coinvolgi fino a tre amici per divertirvi insieme. Potete giocare tutti nei panni di Kirby, ognuno con un colore diverso, oppure assumere un personaggio diverso ciascuno: Meta Knight, King Dedede e Waddle Dee. Sarà divertente collaborare per progredire nel gioco, raccogliendo le Stelle punti e le Stelle abilità. Non preoccuparti se il tempo per giocare con gli amici è poco, chiunque può unirsi al gioco o andarsene in qualsiasi momento.

The alien is desperate to return to its home planet and so Kirby and his enemies decide to work together and help - starting out on a mission to find the missing chunks of the vessel which have been spread across the realm. Play on your own or recruit up to three friends who can join in the fun. Whether you want to all play as Kirby, each in a different colour, or mix things up by each taking a different character – Meta Knight, King Dedede and Waddle Dee – you can all enjoy playing cooperatively to progress through the game by collecting Point Stars and Ability Stars. Don’t worry if you only meet up with your friends for a short while, anyone can join and leave the game at any time.

NL.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
NL.description: Kirby, Meta Knight, King Dedede en Waddle Dee staan klaar om je mee te nemen naar Dream Land in Kirby’s Adventure Wii, een nieuw, zijwaarts scrollend platformavontuur voor één tot vier spelers. Dit keer kun je ook met de vijanden van Kirby spelen, al blijft de roze held met zijn vermogen om te inhaleren en te transformeren natuurlijk de ster van het spel. Het avontuur begint als een buitenaards ruimteschip neerstort in Popstar Land en de brokstukken van dit voertuig over het hele land worden verspreid. Om de buitenaardse bestuurder te helpen terug te keren naar zijn thuisplaneet, besluiten Kirby en zijn vijanden samen te werken. Met vereende krachten gaan ze op avontuur om de ontbrekende stukken van het ruimteschip te vinden. Speel in je eentje of nodig drie vrienden uit om met z’n vieren tegelijk te spelen. Jullie kunnen spelen met Kirby’s in verschillende kleuren of naast Kirby kiezen voor de andere personages: Meta Knight, King Dedede en Waddle Dee. Zo kun je het hele avontuur samenwerkend doorlopen en elkaar helpen om de Point Stars en Ability Stars te verzamelen. Maak je geen zorgen als je vrienden maar even kunnen blijven, elke speler kan wanneer hij maar wil in- en uit- het spel stappen.

NZ.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
NZ.description: Kirby, Meta Knight, King Dedede and Waddle Dee are ready to transform your living room into Dream Land once more in Kirby's Adventure Wii! In this side-scrolling adventure game, you can play on your own or with up to three of your friends. Kirby, in his many guises, is in control of the infamous foursome – help him use his powerful Copy Ability to inhale, spit or transform as enemies rise to the challenge. Kicking off this action packed adventure, an alien spaceship has crash-landed, scattering pieces of the ship across the otherwise peaceful Popstar land. The alien is desperate to return to its home planet and so Kirby and his enemies decide to work together and help - starting out on a mission to find the missing chunks of the vessel which have been spread across the realm. Play on your own or recruit up to three friends who can join in the fun. Whether you want to all play as Kirby, each in a different colour, or mix things up by each taking a different character – Meta Knight, King Dedede and Waddle Dee – you can all enjoy playing cooperatively to progress through the game by collecting Point Stars and Ability Stars. Don’t worry if you only meet up with your friends for a short while, anyone can join and leave the game at any time.

PL.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
PL.description: Kirby, Meta Knight, King Dedede and Waddle Dee are ready to transform your living room into Dream Land once more in Kirby's Adventure Wii! In this side-scrolling adventure game, you can play on your own or with up to three of your friends. Kirby, in his many guises, is in control of the infamous foursome – help him use his powerful Copy Ability to inhale, spit or transform as enemies rise to the challenge. Kicking off this action packed adventure, an alien spaceship has crash-landed, scattering pieces of the ship across the otherwise peaceful Popstar land. The alien is desperate to return to its home planet and so Kirby and his enemies decide to work together and help - starting out on a mission to find the missing chunks of the vessel which have been spread across the realm. Play on your own or recruit up to three friends who can join in the fun. Whether you want to all play as Kirby, each in a different colour, or mix things up by each taking a different character – Meta Knight, King Dedede and Waddle Dee – you can all enjoy playing cooperatively to progress through the game by collecting Point Stars and Ability Stars. Don’t worry if you only meet up with your friends for a short while, anyone can join and leave the game at any time.

PT.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
PT.description: Kirby, Meta Knight, King Dedede e Waddle Dee preparam-se para voltar a transformar a tua sala de estar em Dream Land, com Kirby's Adventure Wii, a nova aventura de Kirby para a Wii. Neste jogo de aventuras em que o icónico herói cor-de-rosa é mais uma vez o protagonista, cabe-te a ti ajudá-lo a usar a sua potente Copy Ability para inalar, cuspir ou transformar-se! No início desta aventura recheada de ação, uma nave espacial extraterrestre aterra de emergência, espalhando pedaços da nave pela outrora pacífica Popstar. O extraterrestre está desesperado por regressar ao seu planeta de origem e assim Kirby e os seus inimigos decidem trabalhar em conjunto para o ajudarem, iniciando uma missão para encontrarem os pedaços da embarcação que foram espalhados por todo o reino. Joga sozinho ou convida até três amigos para se juntarem à diversão. Quer queiram todos jogar na pele de Kirby, cada um com uma cor diferente, quer prefiram personagens diferentes como Meta Knight, King Dedede e Waddle Dee, podem todos desfrutar do modo de jogo cooperativo para avançarem no jogo recolhendo pontos e estrelas. Mas não te preocupes se só te encontrares com os teus amigos durante um período curto de tempo pois todos poderão entrar ou sair do jogo em qualquer altura.

RU.name: Kirby's Adventure™ Wii
RU.description: Kirby, Meta Knight, King Dedede и Waddle Dee в очередной раз готовы превратить вашу гостиную в Dream Land с новой приключенческой игрой Kirby's Adventure Wii. Этой сайдскролинговой веселой игрой можно наслаждаться как в одиночку, так и в компании с 3 друзьями. Многоликий Kirby похищен злодеями – помогите ему, используя мощную способность копирования «Copy», чтобы он смог вдыхать, выдыхать или трансформироваться – это поможет справиться с врагами, пройти все испытания. В самом начале этого наполненного действием приключения космический корабль инопланетян совершает аварийную посадку, и части корабля разлетаются по мирному королевству Popstar. Инопланетяне отчаянно жаждут вернуться на родную планету как можно скорее, и поэтому Kirby и его враги решают объединиться и помочь потерпевшим крушение. Они отправляются на поиски недостающих частей корабля. Играйте в одиночку или предложите троим друзьям присоединиться к вам. Вы все можете играть за Kirby, каждый разного цвета, или смешать все и играть за разных персонажей – Meta Knight, King Dedede и Waddle – вам предстоит объединить усилия для того чтобы пройти все испытания, собирая Point Stars и Ability Stars. Вы можете играть с друзьями, даже если вы встретились ненадолго – каждый может присоединиться или покинуть игру в любой момент.
